title: Kindly Myers Joins The Show To Clear Her Name!
description:
Yesterday, we read an email from a listener concerned about her dad. He met a woman on Tinder by the name of "Kindley Meyers" who was scamming him! 
The real Kindly Myers heard this story and called in today to set the record straight. Listen...
